Change: You take off your soiled <OLD_UNDERWEAR_DESC> and put on $UNDERWEAR_PREFIX$ clean $UNDERWEAR_NAME$.
Change_Destroyed: You ruined your $UNDERWEAR_NAME$ when taking <it#them> off. So you throw <it#them> away.
Getting_Changed_Destroyed: Your $INSPECT_UNDERWEAR_NAME_NO_PREFIX$ <is#are> ruined and thrown away for you.
Change_Requires_Pants: You don't have another pair of $PANTS_NAME$ here to change into. You probably need to go home first.
Change_Requires_Home: Dirty pants have to be changed at home.
Change_At_Home: You change yourself into another pair of $PANTS_NAME$.
PeekWaistband: You peek inside your waistband and see
EasyMode_On: Easy Mode on. Hunger and Thirst are refilled every morning and the wet beds dried.
EasyMode_Off: Easy Mode off. Hunger and Thirst are never refilled and wet beds dry slowly.
